properties.headline: High Surf Advisory issued February 6 at 3:28AM EST until February 8 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the High Surf Advisory, large breaking waves of 7
to 10 feet expected in the surf zone. For the Coastal Flood
Advisory, 1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level
expected for sound side areas adjacent to the Pamlico Sound
and adjacent tidal creeks.

* WHERE...Hatteras Island.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only
isolated road closures expected. Dangerous swimming and
surfing conditions and localized beach erosion.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

Inexperienced swimmers should remain out of the water due to
dangerous surf conditions.

NWSheadline: COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM EST SATURDAY... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM EST SATURDAY
